General.Name: Surapon Foods Public Company Limited
General.Description: Surapon Foods Public Company Limited manufactures, distributes, and exports seafood, finished, and semi-finished frozen foods in Thailand and internationally. The company offers various food products, including boiled shrimp, sushi shrimp, fish, squid, etc.; ready to eat products, such as dim sum, deep-fried food, and processed chicken; and Halal products comprising dim sum and deep-fried food under the Farhana brand name. It also provides sales and marketing; and cold storage warehouse and logistic services. The company was formerly known as Surapon Seafoods Public Company Limited and changed its name to Surapon Foods Public Company Limited in 1996. Surapon Foods Public Company Limited was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Muang, Thailand.
